TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PersonalizableAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class PersonalizableAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class PersonalizableAttribute sealed : Attribute

Docs.summary: Represents the personalization attribute. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 個人化屬性， `Personalizable`，套用至需要保存個人化資訊的公開的控制項屬性。 ASP.NET 會自動產生的程式碼，以保存或 Web 組件頁面上的 Web 組件區域中控制項時，從基礎資料存放區擷取這些值。
要標示為可個人化的屬性，就必須符合下列需求：
- 屬性必須是公用的和必須擁有公用的 get 和 set 存取子。
- 屬性必須是讀取/寫入屬性。
- 屬性必須是不含參數。
- 屬性無法編製索引。
載入和儲存個人化資料的屬性自動產生程式碼。 支援個人化的屬性取決於屬性，而此屬性符合上面所列的條件約束的這個屬性存在。
請注意，唯讀和唯寫屬性不支援個人化。 將這個屬性套用至唯讀或唯寫屬性會導致<xref:System.Web.HttpException>所擲回。 參數化的屬性也會擲回<xref:System.Web.HttpException>例外狀況。
如果透過任何特殊處理，個別的屬性，但不使用這個屬性會從個人化排除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable>介面可用。
如需使用屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[Web 組件個人化概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>在程式碼中的類別。 此範例包含參考稱為 Web 組件使用者控制項的.aspx 頁面`ColorSelector.ascx`。 下列程式碼是範例.aspx 檔案。
[!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_SimplePersonalization#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_SimplePersonalization/CS/Default.aspx#1)]
下列程式碼是用於`ColorSelector.ascx`控制項。
> [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。
[!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_SimplePersonalization#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_SimplePersonalization/CS/ColorSelector.ascx#2)]

Docs.exception: The property is a read-only or write-only public property. \- or - The property is a private or protected read/write property. \- or - The property has index parameters.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會在內部設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>屬性，以`true`，則<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>屬性設<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.User>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>屬性設`false`。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool isPersonalizable) cil managed

Docs.param: A Boolean value indicating whether the property can be personalized.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the provided parameter.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個建構函式會在內部設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>屬性設為值的布林值的參數，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>屬性設<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.User>，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>屬性設`false`。
這個建構函式是很有用，如果您想要將標示為不可個人化衍生的型別上的基底類型上的 可個人化的虛擬屬性的衍生型別。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope scope) cil managed

Docs.param: A indicating the scope of the personalization.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the provided parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會在內部設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>屬性，以`true`，則<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>屬性，以指定的參數和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>屬性設`false`。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope scope, bool isSensitive) cil managed
Public Sub New (scope As PersonalizationScope, isSensitive As Boolean)

Docs.param: A indicating the scope of the personalization.
A Boolean value indicating whether the property information is considered sensitive.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the provided parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會在內部設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>屬性，以`true`，則<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>第一個參數指定的屬性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>屬性，以指定的第二個參數。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Default As PersonalizableAttribute

Docs.summary: Returns an attribute instance that indicates no support for personalization. This field is read-only.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 搭配使用此欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsDefaultAttribute%2A>方法。
此欄位和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.NotPersonalizable>欄位有相同的值。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Equals(object obj) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Equals (obj As Object) As Boolean

Docs.param: The to be compared to the current instance.
Docs.summary: When overridden, returns a Boolean evaluation of the current instance of and another instance supplied as a parameter.
Docs.returns: if the values are equal; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>執行個體都視為相等，如果他們<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>屬性設定都相同。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetHashCode() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetHashCode () As Integer

Docs.summary: When overridden, returns a hash code of the attribute.
Docs.returns: A hash code in the form of an integer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雜湊程式碼為基礎的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>屬性設定。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.ICollection GetPersonalizableProperties(class System.Type type) cil managed

Docs.param: The type on which to look for properties.
Docs.summary: Returns a collection of objects for the properties that match the parameter type and are marked as personalizable.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個方法會傳回集合，其中包含零或多個<xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo>物件，與每一個屬性，也就是指定之型別的集合中的一個物件標示為可個人化，其中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>等於`true`。
`type`參數是要尋找的型別`Personalizable`屬性。 例如，您可以在中傳遞`"typeof(MyWebPart)"`以取得`Personalizable`上的屬性`MyWebPart`類別。

Docs.exception: A public property on the type is marked as personalizable but is read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsDefaultAttribute() cil managed
Public Overrides Function IsDefaultAttribute () As Boolean

Docs.summary: When overridden, returns a value that indicates whether the attribute instance equals the value of the static field.
Docs.returns: if the attribute instance equals the static field; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Default>欄位會指出不支援個人化。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsPersonalizable As Boolean
public: property bool IsPersonalizable { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the setting that indicates whether the attribute can be personalized, as established by one of the constructors.
Docs.value: 如果此屬性可個人化;，否則， 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行個體時，這個值會設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>建立類別。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsSensitive As Boolean
public: property bool IsSensitive { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the setting that indicates whether the attribute is sensitive, as established by one of the constructors.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 執行個體時，這個值會設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>建立類別。
此屬性控制匯出的屬性值的方式。 如果屬性設定為`true`，就不會匯出時的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode.NonSensitiveData>。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Match(object obj) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Match (obj As Object) As Boolean

Docs.param: The to be compared to the current instance.
Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the current instance of and the specified have the same property value.
Docs.returns: if the two attributes have the same value; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來比對具有相同的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable%2A>值。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly NotPersonalizable As PersonalizableAttribute

Docs.summary: Returns an attribute instance that indicates no support for personalization. This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此欄位和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Default>欄位有相同的值。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Personalizable As PersonalizableAttribute

Docs.summary: Returns an attribute instance that indicates support for personalization. This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性執行個體具有其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.User>及其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>屬性設定為`false`。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Scope As PersonalizationScope

Docs.summary: Gets the enumeration value for the class instance, as set by one of the constructors.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 執行個體時，這個值會設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>建立類別。
這個屬性會控制當屬性值是儲存和載入，取決於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Scope%2A>頁的屬性。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly SharedPersonalizable As PersonalizableAttribute

Docs.summary: Returns an attribute instance that indicates support for personalization with a shared scope. This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性執行個體具有其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared>及其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>屬性設定為`false`。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly UserPersonalizable As PersonalizableAttribute

Docs.summary: Returns an attribute instance that indicates support for personalization in scope. This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性執行個體具有其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.Scope%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.User>及其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsSensitive%2A>屬性設定為`false`。
